description:
Suzu introduces Ikuto to her master, the Lord of the South. Her master informs them that today is the "Survival Game Day" which decides who will be the future lord and enlists their help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nyan is My Master / I Want to Look at the Sakura
にゃんだって, お師匠様 / 見たくって, さくら
